title: The topology induced by an uniform structure

blocks.name: cutop
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the function inducing a topology from a uniform structure.
blocks.origin: const class cutop { unifTop }

blocks.name: diff.cutop.s
diff.cutop.c
diff.cutop.w
df-utop
blocks.content: Definition of a topology induced by a uniform structure. Definition 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.4. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-utop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cutop, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cust)), crab(s1, cpw(cdm(cuni(cv(s0)))), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wss(cima(cv(s3), csn(cv(s2))), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-utop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ unifTop =(s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(UnifOn)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà P(dom(‚ãÉ s0))| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s1, ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà s0,(s3 " { s2 })‚äÜ s1))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: utopval
blocks.content: The topology induced by a uniform structure ` U ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm utopval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, cutop, c0, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0))))), cuni(crn(cust)), crab(s0, cpw(cdm(cuni(cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0))))), universe, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  df-utop(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  rabeqbidv(s0, cpw(cdm(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0)))))
  pweqd(cdm(cuni(cv(hs0))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqtr4d(cdm(cuni(cv(hs0))), c1, cdm(cuni(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dmeqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  unieqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c1, cdm(cuni(c0))))
  ustbas2(c0, c1)
  ralbidv(s1, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c0, wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0))))
  rexeqdv(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  elrnust(c0, c1)
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0))))), universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  elfvex(c0, cust, c1)
  pwexg(c1, universe)
  rabexg(s0, cpw(c1), universe, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wss(cima(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(cust)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cdm(cuni(cv(hs0))))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cust, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cust, c1)
  diff.cust.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(cust, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cust, c1)
  diff.cust.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm utopval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚Üí(unifTop ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, cutop, c0, { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0))}, ‚ãÉ ran(UnifOn), { s0 ‚àà P(dom(‚ãÉ hs0))| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà hs0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0))}, universe, c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  df-utop(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  rabeqbidv(s0, P(dom(‚ãÉ hs0)), P(c1), (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà hs0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0)))
  pweqd(dom(‚ãÉ hs0), c1, (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  eqtr4d(dom(‚ãÉ hs0), c1, dom(‚ãÉ c0), (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  dmeqd(‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ c0, (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  unieqd(hs0, c0, (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), hs0 = c0, c1 = dom(‚ãÉ c0))
  ustbas2(c0, c1)
  ralbidv(s1, s0, (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà hs0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0))
  rexeqdv(s2, hs0, c0, (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0), (s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  elrnust(c0, c1)
  3syl(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0))} ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå, P(c1)‚àà ùïå)
  elfvex(c0, cust, c1)
  pwexg(c1, universe)
  rabexg(s0, P(c1), universe, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà P(c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s2 " { s1 })‚äÜ s0))})
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ ran(UnifOn))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, dom(‚ãÉ hs0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, ‚ãÉ hs0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (UnifOn ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cust, c1)
  diff.cust.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, (UnifOn ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cust, c1)
  diff.cust.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: elutop
blocks.content: Open sets in the topology induced by an uniform structure ` U ` on ` X ` (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elutop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cutop, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cutop, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2)))), wa(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2)))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cutop, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2)))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0)))))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(cutop, c0), crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  utopval(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c2, cpw(c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c2, wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2)))
  rexbidv(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0)), wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c2, cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))))
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2))), wss(c2, c1))
  pm5.21ndd(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wcel(c2, universe)))
  elex(c2, cpw(c1))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  ssexd(c2, c1, universe, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cust, c1)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wb(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wss(c2, c1))))
  elpwg(c2, universe, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wss(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s0))), c2))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elutop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(unifTop ` c0)‚Üî(c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(unifTop ` c0), (c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2))), (c2 ‚àà P(c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2))))
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(unifTop ` c0), (c2 ‚àà P(c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2))), c2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà P(c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ hs0))})
  eleq2d(c2, (unifTop ` c0), { hs0 ‚àà P(c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ hs0))}, c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  utopval(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c2, P(c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ hs0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2)))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ hs0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2))
  rexbidv(s1, c0, hs0 = c2, (s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ hs0, (s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2)
  sseq2(hs0, c2, (s1 " { s0 }))
  anbi1d(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà P(c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2)), c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  pm5.21ndd(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà P(c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), (c2 ‚àà P(c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  elex(c2, P(c1))
  ex(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexd(c2, c1, universe, (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  elfvex(c0, cust, c1)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà P(c1)‚Üî c2 ‚äÜ c1)))
  elpwg(c2, universe, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1 " { s0 })‚äÜ c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: utoptop
blocks.content: The topology induced by a uniform structure ` U ` is a topology. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm utoptop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(cfv(cutop, c0), ctop))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(cfv(cutop, c0), ctop), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cutop, c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(cutop, c0)))), wral(hs0, cfv(cutop, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cutop, c0), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cutop, c0)))))
  alrimiv(hs0, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cutop, c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(cutop, c0))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cutop, c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(cutop, c0)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cutop, c0))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(cutop, c0)), wss(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs3, cuni(cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wss(cima(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs3))), cuni(cv(hs0))))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cutop, c0))), wss(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)))
  sstrd(cv(hs0), cpw(c1), cfv(cutop, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cutop, c0))))

  utopval(hs2, hs1, hs0, c0, c1)
  ssrab2(hs2, cpw(c1), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), cv(hs2)))))

  ssidd(c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  ralrimivw(hs1, c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), c1)))
  mpd(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1)))

  rnss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1))
  rnxpid(c1)
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wi(wral(hs0, c0, wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), c1))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  ustne0(c0, c1)
  r19.2zb(hs0, c0, wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), c1))
  elutop(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c1)
  elpwuni(c1, cfv(cutop, c0))

blocks.name: ustuqtop
blocks.content: For a given uniform structure ` U ` on a set ` X ` , there is a unique topology ` j ` such that the set ` ran ( v e. U |-> ( v " { p } ) ) ` is the filter of the neighborhoods of ` p ` for that topology. Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.3. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: utopsnneip
blocks.content: The neighborhoods of a point ` P ` for the topology induced by an uniform space ` U ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm utopsnneip(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnei, c3), csn(c2)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), csn(c2))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cutop, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  utopsnneiplem(s0, hs4, hs3, c0, c1, c2, c3, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cmpt(hs2, c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs2)))))), cv(hs1))))), cmpt(hs2, c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs2)))))))
  cbvrabv(hs0, hs4, cpw(c1), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cmpt(hs2, c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs2)))))), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs3, cv(hs4), wcel(cv(hs4), cfv(cmpt(hs2, c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs2)))))), cv(hs3)))))

blocks.name: utop3cls
blocks.content: Relation between a topological closure and a symmetric entourage in an uniform space. Second part of proposition 2 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.4. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm utop3cls(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, cxp(c1, c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c0), wceq(ccnv(c3), c3))), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, co(c4, ctx, c4)), c2), ccom(c3, ccom(c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cutop, c0))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cfv(ccl, co(c4, ctx, c4)), c2), ccom(c3, ccom(c2, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, cxp(c1, c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c0), wceq(ccnv(c3), c3))))
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, cxp(c1, c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c0), wceq(ccnv(c3), c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, co(c4, ctx, c4)), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), ccom(c3, ccom(c2, c3))))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), ccom(c3, ccom(c2, c3)), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, cxp(c1, c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c0), wceq(ccnv(c3), c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, co(c4, ctx, c4)), c2))))
  sylancr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, cxp(c1, c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c0), wceq(ccnv(c3), c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, co(c4, ctx, c4)), c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))), wrel(cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1)))
